description: INCONTROLLER can use the CODESYS protocol to remotely connect to Schneider PLCs and perform maintenance functions on the device.[5]INCONTROLLER can use Telnet to upload payloads and execute commands on Omron PLCs.   [2][3] The malware can also use HTTP-based CGI scripts (e.g., cpu.fcgi, ecat.fcgi) to gain administrative access to the device.[5]
